DOC.brief_summary: This study will compare the pharmacokinetic performance of film-coated tablet and granule formulations of RG1662 under fed and fasted conditions in healthy volunteers. A randomized, four-period, four-treatment crossover design is used. In each period, each volunteer will receive a single oral dose of the tablet or granule formulation either with or without food.
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Bioavailability Study of Film-coated Tablet and Granule Formulations of RG1662
DOC.criteria: Male or female volunteers, 18 to 60 years of age, inclusive A history of epilepsy, convulsions or significant head injury Any other clinically relevant abnormalities, concomitant diseases or ongoing medical conditions
